mapper.insert: insert into user_info (user_id, nick_name, email, password, sex, birthday, school, person_introduction, join_time, last_login_time, last_login_ip, status, notice_info, total_coin_count, current_coin_count, theme, user_account) values (#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, #{school,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{personIntroduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{joinTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastLoginIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{noticeInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalCoinCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{currentCoinCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{theme,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{userAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update user_info set nick_name = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=TINYINT}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, school = #{school,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, person_introduction = #{personIntroduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, join_time = #{joinTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_login_time = #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_login_ip = #{lastLoginIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, notice_info = #{noticeInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, total_coin_count = #{totalCoinCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, current_coin_count = #{currentCoinCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, theme = #{theme,jdbcType=TINYINT}, user_account = #{userAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select user_id, nick_name, email, password, sex, birthday, school, person_introduction, join_time, last_login_time, last_login_ip, status, notice_info, total_coin_count, current_coin_count, theme, user_account from user_info where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
